about_the_game:
Toontail is a game of exploring the world, solving problems, and protecting peace by becoming a knight of the cartoon-like world 'Toon World'.
Feel and enjoy the Toon World in your own way at the Toon World, which includes all the elements of action, puzzle, adventure, and role-playing!

-Adventure-

Travel the beautiful Toon World and meet taking characters.
The story of Toon world can vary a little depending on your choice during the adventure.




-Puzzle-

Solve the problems you encounter while traveling with hints from somewhere on the map and the player's wit!




-Combat-

Use a variety of weapons and shields appropriately to defeat enemies that stand in your way!
You will be faced with very easy chapters to extreme chapters.
Items have their own skills.
Set up 3 weapons slots and 1 shield slot at your disposal to engage in your own battles.

name: TOON TALE DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 intel 64-bit
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You are the last knight in the Toon world. Adventure the world and save it from danger!
